definitions.definition: In an obvious or clearly apparent manner.
examples: She was in floods of tears and obviously very upset.
She'd obviously not gone to sleep yet: her eyes were bloodshot with sleepiness.
The plane has obviously been delayed.

definitions.definition: Used as a filler word, or to introduce information even when not obvious.
examples: You weren't to know, but I've spoken to, obviously , Jim about this, and ...

main_definition: In an obvious or clearly apparent manner.
secondary_definitions: ( colloquial ) Used as a filler word, or to introduce information even when not obvious.
